body.name: ESGAMING Power Supply 750W, 80+ Gold Certified, Fully Modular RGB Power Supply, ATX 12V Active PFC Switching Power Supply, 10 Year Warranty
features: ▶【80 PLUS GOLD CERTIFIED】LLC Pro+DC-DC structure provides very stable voltage output, 80 PLUS Gold certified, with 92% efficiency or higher under typical loads, saving your money on your electrical bill, reducing heat in your computer's system and prolonging its life.
▶【FULLY MODULAR CABLE DESIGN】Wire-free design reduces the confusion of cables' management, increases airflow to improve overall efficiency and heat dissipation performance.
▶【ARGB LIGHT MODE】25 Smart ARGB lighting modes with memory function, press RGB controller switch to choose the color mode you like: single color mode, breathing lights mode, color mix mode.
▶ 【HIGH-END COMPONENTS】Wire-free inside the PSU on the DC side for enhanced cooling and longevity, DC-DC structure delivers very stable and continuous power output.
▶【ULTRA-QUIET FAN】Low noise 120mm RGB Fan with intelligent fan speed control ensures that fan noise is kept to a minimum, even at full load.

▶ 【COMPREHENSIVE POWER PROTECTION】Heavy duty protection from electrical and thermal irregularities with Over Current/Voltage/Power/Temperature Protection, Under Voltage Protection, and Short Circuit Protection(OCP/OVP/OPP/OTP/UVP/SCP) provide maximum safety to your critical system components.
body.description: ESGAMING Power Supply 750W 80+ Gold Certified PSU Fully Modular Cable Design The fully modular power supply is available in 750W and built to deliver 80 PLUS Gold efficiency. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BRILLIANT LIGHTING RGB POWER SUPPLY 750W RGB LED technology is becoming more and more prevalent in the computer industry, with many PC gamers looking for a way to make their rig stand out. An RGB PSU is the relatively latest thing among the various PC RGB components. The RGB element in an RGB power supply is mostly the fan that where the RGB lighting can be seen. If you are a gaming enthusiast who has a love for RGB Lighting then having an RGB power supply can further spice up the RGB lighting in your PC Case given that you already have other RGB components including an RGB CPU Cooler, RGB RAM, RGB Fans, RGB Case and RGB LED Strips. Nowadays you can find some very good high-end and budget RGB power supplies from ESGAMING. Our RGB power supplies not only look good but also offer high performance and quality. Features RGB Ring Fan on top, and the lights is coming from the top and side. To compare with others, ESGAMING RGB power supply 120 mm large fan with Hydraulic bearin technology provide greater air intake volume up to 7%, less noise up to 3% and RGB synchronous with the fan spinning. Featuring 80 Plus GOLD certified efficiency and a mainboard Taiwan capacitor, this 750W RGB PSU is a great choice for those looking for a great quality power supply at a great value. Stable Output: offers your system more reliable and stable output voltages, providing more consistent power deliveryConvenient Cable Design: Long cable length supports high-end case and meets user’s needs of perfect cable managementESGAMING power supplies are engineered to reach the same level of performance as top-end GOLD units, but at a great value. Aesthetics APPEARANCE：Highend SECC black coating casing Honeycomb ventilation design for optimal heat dissipation.25 smart RGB lighting modes with various colors： single color mode, breathing lights mode, color mix mode.Flat, black cables and connectors are also included in ESGAMING High-quality PSUs

Power Supply 750W ESGAMING offers most reliable, efficient and most desirable design for high-end PC builders. It incorporates flat cables and up to 92% overall efficiency. ESGAMING Power Supply 750W 80+ Gold Certified PSU Fully Modular Cable Design The fully modular power supply is available in 750W and built to deliver 80 PLUS Gold efficiency. The series features a 120mm hydraulic bearing fan and other premium components to help deliver a continuous and stable power with an ambient temperature, while near silent operation and reliable performance are . 80 PLUS Gold Certified Fully Modular Cables Design ATX 12V Active PFC Silent and durable 120mm RGB fan OVP, UVP, OCP, OPP, SCP, and Dual OTP Protections APFC+LLC+DC-DC structure 25 ARGB Lighting Modes Included Flat, black cables and connectors

RGB PSUs are suited for designs that favor RGB lighting. They complement the structure’s design and improve its appearance. Addressable LEDs are found in our RGB PSUs, allowing you to adjust many characteristics of the illumination, such as modes and colors. High performance can be achieved by combining the Best RGB Power Supply Units with supported components in terms of power output. More power-hungry components will necessitate stronger power supplies.Fully modular connections allow users to establish a clean build to emphasize the end product. Flat cables will also make cable management a lot easier.

COMPACT 160MM-LONG CASING The SECC black coating casing, black bushing cables and connectors, and black fan help to bring a high-tech appearance to your system. Ensures an easy fit in almost all modern enthusiast PC cases. STABLE OUTPUT Offers your system more reliable and stable output voltages, providing more consistent power delivery FULLY MODULAR CABLE Extremely well packaged and includes all necessary accessories, no issues runs your system perfectly.

reviews.reviewText: Funciona hasta el momento de manera óptima.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars does not work on arrival ...
reviews.reviewText: no manual either. box seems to be opened before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very colorful; Great heat dissipation
reviews.reviewText: When I first received the package, I was a little worried because it came in a box different than the one shown by ESGAMING. It also had no manual. Fortunately, I've been studying PCs and how they work, so I already know how to connect the cables.The important part to know, for anyone considering this, is it produces very little heat. Even during intense gaming or other heavy workloads, the power supply itself does not produce the majority of the heat. I get more heat from my AMD Radeon GPU and AMD CPU than this power supply! It definitely holds up to its 80 Plus Gold rating.For me, the colored lighting is really just a bonus. Since I have a glass panel on one side of my case, I can see the light from this PSU very well. It has various color options and settings, which are as follows (not necessarily in this order):+ Colors: Multi-colored, red, yellow, green, cyan, blue, purple, and white.+ Modes: Static, rotating, flashing (fading off and on), cycle through colors (like flashing, except it fades from one color to the next), off.For anyone hoping the RGB lights can be controlled by external software, you're out of luck with this one, as it can only be controlled with the press of a single button. Still, it's an affordable, colorful replacement to any stock, less efficient, or simply older PSUs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My old power supply was shutting off my computer from time to time so I needed a new one. I upgraded to 650W and it seems to be working very well. My old one worked for 10 years or more 24/7. This new one fit just like the old one and works very well so far. The extra light in it is also a nice touch that I did not have in the old one. Everything works like it suppose to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Powers everything just right and literally makes no sound, the rgb is awesome as well and can be changed to match your pc colors. The cords are a bit confusing though, not like most supplies. But still great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for high-end CPUs
reviews.reviewText: If you want to buy a high end CPU or motherboard to do some overclocking or run the CPU on full power this power supply won't work because for some F up reason they only put 8 pin CPU connector cable for this power supply and it won't comes with the extra 4 pin connector. So it is made for the motherboard that do not need or have that extra 4 pin CPU power contactor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit, lots of power and had my new computer humming in no time.
reviews.reviewText: Worked great and the lights was just a little extra as my new case has a glass window

reviews.reviewTitle: Good looking psu, works great so far, no issues
